description.displayText: Our family is so incredibly blessed to have Lisa in our lives. We don't know what we would do without her! She has been caring for our toddler boy since he was about a year-and-a-half old. We were looking for a new nanny after we moved to a new neighborhood, and from the minute we interviewed Lisa and our son met her, we knew she would be a great fit for our family - our son absolutely adores her. Lisa has such a sweet personality and her creativity shines through as she teaches our son fun activities throughout the day, from singing to dancing to painting and drawing. She has even been proactive and searched out neighborhood activities for the two of them to do together - like our library story time and some local sing-a-longs for toddlers. We 100% trust her with our son, she is reliable, a good communicator, follows direction regarding needs and routines, and has even taught us some things along the way too! We cannot recommend Lisa enough!

description.displayText: Lisa is a sweet, caring, creative and fun person and our 18 month old son absolutely loves her. She is also punctual, reliable and great at communicating with us about day to day needs and activities and giving us updates throughout the day. I feel that our child is happy, safe, and having fun when he is with her. I am very grateful to have her and for her flexibility in helping us through a hectic move to Philadelphia. I highly recommend her!

description.displayText: Lisa is a very artistic, caring, patient and sweet caregiver that always does her best!
description.originalText: Lisa is a very artistic, caring, patient and sweet caregiver that always does her best!

description.displayText: I have known Lisa for the past 7 years in the capacity of a friend and fellow Mother. She is a creative spirit with a large heart and warm soul, her son is testament to her mothering abilities, patience and warmth with children. I am sure you will be happy to have Lisa care for your child and contribute to your family.
